SEARCH
Module it.polimi.ingsw.gc31
Package it.polimi.ingsw.gc31.client_server.listeners

Class GameListenerHandler

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.gc31.client_server.listeners.GameListenerHandler
public class GameListenerHandler extends Object
This class handles the listeners for the game. Listeners are used to retrieve updates from the game model and send them to clients. The listeners are organized based on different listener types. Use the methods provided to enable/disable listeners, add/remove listeners, and notify listeners.

  • Constructor Summary

    Description
    GameListenerHandler(String username, Object lock)
    This class handles the listeners for the game.

    Notifies the listener of the specified type with the given GameModel object only if enabled is set true.

    • GameListenerHandler

      public GameListenerHandler(String username, Object lock)
      This class handles the listeners for the game. Listeners are used to retrieve updates from the game model and send them to clients. The listeners are organized based on different listener types. Use the methods provided to enable/disable listeners, add/remove listeners, and notify listeners.

  • Method Details

    • setEnabled

      public void setEnabled()
      Sets the enabled status to true.

    • setDisabled

      public void setDisabled()
      Disables the listener so that it does not receive updates.

    • notifyAllListeners

      public void notifyAllListeners(GameModel model)
      Notifies all the listeners with the given GameModel object only if enabled is set true.
      Parameters:
      model - The GameModel object containing the updates to be sent to the listeners.

    • addListener

      public void addListener(ListenerType type, Listener listener)
      Adds a listener of the specified type to the listeners map.
      Parameters:
      type - the type of the listener to add
      listener - the listener to add

    • removeListener

      public void removeListener(ListenerType type)
      Removes a listener of the specified type from the listeners map.
      Parameters:
      type - the type of the listener to remove

    • notifyListener

      public void notifyListener(ListenerType type, GameModel model)
      Notifies the listener of the specified type with the given GameModel object only if enabled is set true.
      Parameters:
      type - The type of listener to notify.
      model - The GameModel object containing the updates to be sent to the listener.
